label: TransportRoute
comment: A way or course taken from one location to another for the purpose of transporting cargo and or passengers.

datatypeProperties.comment: A departure point, expressed as text, for this specified route.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The code specifying the type of frequency for this transport route, such as weekly, bi-monthly or daily.
Binary object data that is the map of this transport route.
A type, expressed as text, for this specified route.
A code specifying a security level for this transport route.
A means of transport, expressed as text, for this transport route.
The code specifying a status for a transport route, such as planned or actual.

objectProperties.comment: A specified period of time for which a frequency is effective for this transport route.
An itinerary stop event for this transport route, such as a port call in a vessel schedule.
The specified period during which this transport route is scheduled.

referencedBy.comment: An actual route for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A requested route for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A scheduled or planned route for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A transport route specified for this transport service.
The route related to this transport event.
A route in the itinerary of this logistics transport movement.
